forum.content:
As part of the U.S Texas gun law. It has brought allowance for guns to exist in campus. A student today carried an item which is restricted to school (a dildo) fighting her so called stupid law.

As a parent I just can't agree with this law. Worrying my kid accidentally get shot in school definitely ruins my life. Luckily I'm not living in Texas...

urls.description: Texas University students plan to take sex toys on campus to protest against a new state law that al
urls.title: Texas university students in dildo protest over gun law - BBC News

forum.title: 「News」Laws you may not agree
